General.Name: Guangdong Advertising Co Ltd
General.Description: Guangdong Advertising Group Co.,Ltd operates as an advertising and marketing company in China and internationally. It offers marketing solutions including brand, digital, media, content, and public relations marketing through G-IN and IP+MCN+AI platforms. The company was formerly known as Guangdong Advertising Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Guangdong Advertising Group Co.,Ltd in June 2015. The company was founded in 1979 and is headquartered in Guangzhou, China.
General.Address: Poly World Trade Center, Guangzhou, China, 510220
